title: Conbine two variables in a special way?
body_html:
As the title, I wanted to conbine two variables in a special way:

a = nn.Linear(*, 6)
b = nn.Linear(*, 3)

and I need to get output at lelement level like

for r  in range(batch_size):
  for c in range(3*6):
    output[r][c] = a[r][c // 3]  + b[r][c % 3]

How can I get the output? and I want to use it in backward function.
